resources.string: A live-action adaptation of Disney\'s version of the classic \'Beauty and the Beast\' tale of a cursed prince and a beautiful young woman who helps him break the spell.A live-action adaptation of Disney\'s version of the classic \'Beauty and the Beast\' tale of a cursed prince and a beautiful young woman who helps him break the spell.A live-action adaptation of Disney\'s version of the classic \'Beauty and the Beast\' tale of a cursed prince and a beautiful young woman who helps him break the spell.
